TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TemplateDefinition extends System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerObject

summary.span: 提供在設計階段定義 Web 伺服器控制項中樣板項目的屬性和方法。

span.span: Provides properties and methods that define a template element in a Web server control at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供基底範本定義的類別可以繼承自和擴充的控制項設計工具中提供支援在設計主機中的樣板化控制項，例如使用[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]。The class provides a base template definition class that can be inherited from and extended for a control designer to use in providing support for templated controls in a design host such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]. 設計主機中使用的屬性和方法的類別來加速建立和編輯在設計階段範本。A design host uses the properties and methods of the class to facilitate creating and editing a template at design time. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何衍生自訂類別從類別。The following code example demonstrates how to derive a custom class from the class. 這個控制項設計工具支援的控制項搭配四個可能的範本。This control designer supports a control with four possible templates. 若要試用，新增 System.Design.dll 組件的參考、 編譯程式碼，然後，在設計託管例如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，查看 [設計] 檢視中的頁面。To try it, add a reference to the System.Design.dll assembly, compile the code, and then, in a design host such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], look at the page in Design view. 選取的控制項，按一下 [動作] 清單選取要修改的範本，然後使用拖放功能將控制項移至範本。Select the control, click the action list to select a template to modify, and then use the drag-and-drop feature to move controls into the template. [!code-csharp[DesignerTemplateGroupSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DesignerTemplateGroupSample/CS/TemplateGroupsSample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DesignerTemplateGroupSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DesignerTemplateGroupSample/VB/TemplateGroupsSample.vb#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DesignerTemplateGroupSample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DesignerTemplateGroupSample/VB/TemplateGroupsSample.aspx#2)]

value.span: 如果允許編輯則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if editing is allowed; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要變更預設值，衍生的類別必須覆寫屬性。To change the default, derived classes must override the property.

span.span: Retrieves a value indicating whether the template should limit content to Web server controls, as set in the constructor.
This property is read-only.

value.span: 如果將內容限制為 Web 伺服器控制項則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if content is limited to Web server controls; otherwise, .

A object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然屬性是唯讀的屬性可以設定。Although the property is read-only, the properties of the can be set.

span.span: Retrieves the component in which the template resides.
This property is read-only.

value.span: 當建立這個 時設定的元件。

span.span: The component as set when this was created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然這屬性是唯讀的可以設定其屬性，而且如果為 true，可以編輯內容。Although this property is read-only, its properties can be set, and if is true, the content can be edited.

summary.span: 擷取設計主應用程式應在屬性方格中顯示之樣板的屬性名稱。

span.span: Retrieves the property name for the template that the design host should display in the property grid.

value.span: 如同範本的名稱應該會出現在**屬性**設計主應用程式的清單。

span.span: The name of the template as it should appear in the **Properties** list of the design host.
